Somerville.Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts:
Le Cordon Bleu [lə kɔʁdɔ̃ blø] (French for "The Blue Ribbon") is hospitality education institution, with approximately 20 schools on five continents. Its education focus is on hospitality management, culinary arts, and gastronomy.


== History ==

The origin of the school name may come from the French Royal and Catholic Ordre des Chevaliers du Saint Esprit.
